entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
